attributes.action: stop social workers, teachers and others in child protection to stop making up stories about parents and children to cause harm and distress to the children and their parents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has to make all those involved responsible for the deliberate distress caused by social workers, teachers etc., do not listen to the children and accuse the parents of making the children lie on their behalf. Social Workers cost the tax payer thousands of pounds for making up false allegations of abuse and court applications based on no factual evidence, just hearsay. Make them criminally responsible.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual local authorities to address.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
